article_title: Mecklenburg County explores health plan change in wake of ACA’s ‘Cadillac’ tax
article_text:
The county hasn’t decided how it will change its plans to meet federal thresholds

Human resources exploring options, including health savings accounts

County seeks to bolster wellness program to keep health care costs low

article_metadata.title: Mecklenburg County explores health plan change in wake of ACA’s ‘Cadillac’ tax | The Charlotte Observer

og.description: Mecklenburg County may change how it offers health care to employees in the next few years as it adapts to a federal tax on high-cost insurance plans.
og.title: Mecklenburg County explores health plan change in wake of ACA’s ‘Cadillac’ tax
